Player History
Drove in 7 runs against West Texas on 8/30/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1982, hitting .522 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Traded from Capital City to Lynchburg on 7/10/1983 (Going to LYN: 3B H. Gonzales, P D. Mikkelson, P J. Vinyals. Going to CC: P J. Reddington)...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/2/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $9,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Bay City on 4/2/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1985, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...

Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
Drove in 6 runs against Toledo on 4/10/1987...
